# Auvolar - Commercial & Industrial LED Lighting

> Auvolar is a B2B LED lighting manufacturer and distributor based in City of Industry, California. We supply DLC-certified, commercial-grade LED fixtures to contractors, electricians, facility managers, and distributors across the United States.

## Company Overview

- Founded: LED lighting manufacturer and wholesale distributor
- Location: City of Industry, CA (Greater Los Angeles)
- Website: https://www.auvolar.com
- Target Market: B2B — contractors, electricians, property managers, distributors
- Certifications: DLC (DesignLights Consortium), UL, ETL, FCC, Energy Star (select products)
- Warranty: 5-10 year standard warranty on most fixtures
- Shipping: Ships from California warehouse, most orders ship same/next day

## Product Categories

### Indoor Lighting
- [UFO High Bay Lights](https://www.auvolar.com/products/indoor/high-bay): 100W-240W, warehouses, gyms, factories — from $69
- [Linear High Bay Lights](https://www.auvolar.com/products/indoor/high-bay): 165W-220W, industrial applications — from $75
- [LED Troffers & Flat Panels](https://www.auvolar.com/products/indoor/troffer): 2x2 and 2x4 configurations — from $45
- [LED Tubes (T8/T5)](https://www.auvolar.com/products/indoor/led-tube): 2ft and 4ft retrofit replacements — from $6
- [Strip & Wrap Lights](https://www.auvolar.com/products/indoor/strip): 4ft and 8ft commercial linear — from $29
- [Vapor Tight Lights](https://www.auvolar.com/products/indoor/vapor-tight): IP65 rated for harsh/wet environments — from $45
- [LED Downlights](https://www.auvolar.com/products/indoor/downlight): 4"-10" recessed, slim, fire-rated — from $12
- [Garage & Canopy Lights](https://www.auvolar.com/products/indoor/canopy): Parking structures, covered areas — from $35
- [Exit Signs & Emergency Lights](https://www.auvolar.com/products/indoor/exit): Battery backup, bi-color options — from $22

### Outdoor Lighting
- [Area & Shoebox Lights](https://www.auvolar.com/products/outdoor/area-light): 75W-420W, parking lots, streets — from $106 ⭐ Best Seller
- [Wall Pack Lights](https://www.auvolar.com/products/outdoor/wall-pack): 30W-120W, building perimeter — from $38
- [Flood Lights](https://www.auvolar.com/products/outdoor/flood): 50W-400W, sports fields, facades — from $40
- [Bollard Lights](https://www.auvolar.com/products/outdoor/bollard): Pathways, landscape lighting — from $224
- [Post Top Lights](https://www.auvolar.com/products/outdoor/post-top): Decorative street lighting — from $169
- [Barn & Gooseneck Lights](https://www.auvolar.com/products/outdoor/barn): Decorative exterior — from $114
- [Security Lights](https://www.auvolar.com/products/specialty/security-light): Dusk-to-dawn, motion sensor — from $50

### Solar Lighting
- [Solar Street/Area Lights](https://www.auvolar.com/products/solar/solar-area): 60W-120W off-grid — from $189
- [Solar Wall Packs](https://www.auvolar.com/products/solar/solar-wall): Off-grid wall mounted — from $30

### Accessories
- [Motion Sensors](https://www.auvolar.com/products): For high bay fixtures — $29
- [Photocells](https://www.auvolar.com/products): Dusk-to-dawn for outdoor fixtures — $15
- [LED Corn Bulbs](https://www.auvolar.com/products): 36W-80W retrofit — from $29

## Key Pages

- [All Products](https://www.auvolar.com/products): Complete LED lighting catalog (125+ products)
- [About Auvolar](https://www.auvolar.com/about): Company story, mission, team
- [Contact Us](https://www.auvolar.com/contact): Sales inquiries, quote requests
- [Services](https://www.auvolar.com/services): Lighting design, rebate assistance, project support
- [Resources](https://www.auvolar.com/resources): Cut sheets, IES files, DLC certificates, installation guides
- [Rebate Finder](https://www.auvolar.com/rebate-finder): Find utility rebates by state/location
- [Tailor Purchasing](https://www.auvolar.com/tailor-purchasing): Custom orders and bulk pricing

## Why Choose Auvolar

1. **Contractor-Focused Pricing**: Direct wholesale pricing, volume discounts, no middleman markup
2. **DLC Certified Products**: Qualify for utility rebates ($20-$150+ per fixture in many states)
3. **Ships from California**: Fast delivery across the US, most items in stock
4. **Technical Support**: Lighting design assistance, photometric layouts, spec reviews
5. **Wide Selection**: 125+ commercial LED products covering indoor, outdoor, and solar categories
6. **Warranty**: 5-10 year manufacturer warranty with US-based support

## Applications & Industries

Auvolar products are used in: warehouses, manufacturing facilities, retail stores, offices, parking lots & garages, gas stations, schools & universities, sports facilities, cold storage, food processing plants, automotive dealerships, and logistics centers.
